subject: Re: Sargood closure - website update
preview: Hi Britt,Sorry for the back and forth replies. Confirming that we have made sure all the changes are made on the pop up notification. Here's what it looks like on our end now:Let us know if you would

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Hi Britt,

Sorry for the back and forth replies. Confirming that we have made sure all the changes are made on the pop up notification. Here's what it looks like on our end now:


Let us know if you would like further changes.
@joel could you also please help me with this one? Thanks!

Hi Rica,

The pop up was still appearing white with a white background across the page so I amended one of our old pop ups (below). Could you please check if it is appearing correctly on your end and also see if you can change the links in the text so they appear white (currently they are blue so you can't see it in the copy).



I can still access the jotform on the book now page, are you able to switch that off for us?

Thank you!

Britt

Hi Britt,

Sorry about that. Confirming that we have updated the pop-up notification.

Here's what it looks like now:


Let us know if you would like further changes.

Hi Rica, Thanks for getting onto that quickly but some changes appear to be incorrect. The copy for the pop up needs to include all of the original copy, with a slight change to the first sentence. The pop up must read: Sargood on Collaroy is now closed due to the evolving situation with the COVID-19 pandemic. Sargood on Collaroy continues to monitor developments, take precautionary measures and strictly follow the guidelines of relevant authorities including the NSW Ministry of Health with regard to COVID-19. The health and wellbeing of our guests and staff members is our top priority. This decision will be reassessed on the 9th of July 2021. For booking enquiries, please call reception on (02) 8597 0600. Club Sargood remains open for physiotherapy and exercise physiology services. Where possible we are offering telehealth. Please do not visit our Club Sargood facility if:
  • You feel unwell in any way,
  • You have been to any of the locations or travelled on nominated public transport routes, during the time and date indicated, in the "Self-isolate and get tested immediately if you've been to these locations" or "Monitor for symptoms if you've been to these locations" or "Public transport routes" tables at NSW Government - Latest news and updates,
  • You have travelled internationally in the last 14 days,
  • You have visited any of the NSW hotspots as identified on the Australian Government website https://www.nsw.gov.au/covid-19/latest-news-and-updates,
  • You have travelled to any of the interstate locations identified as having restrictions on the NSW Government website https://www.nsw.gov.au/covid-19/what-you-can-and-cant-do-under-rules/border-restrictions.
  • You have been in contact with anyone with a confirmed or suspected case of COVID-19.
We have additional precautions in place to ensure the safety of our Club Sargood members including:
  • Pre-screening SMS messages will be sent to all clients 24 hours before arrival,
  • Clients must enter gym via Level 1 only. No access to Level 2,
  • Clients are only able to access site 5 minutes before their session time and must leave immediately afterwards,
  • Staggered start and finishing times to avoid client crossover,
  • Only 1 client permitted in the Club Sargood gym at any time,
  • NO visitors allowed onsite,
  • Clients may have support workers accompany them to site. Support workers must only remain in gym if required to assist client during session otherwise can wait offsite for client to finish session,
  • No independent use of gym - clients are only allowed onsite for a pre-booked therapy appointment,
  • COVID-19 screening and temperature checks will take place for all clients upon arrival,
  • Practice social distancing - stay 1.5 metres from others where ever possible,
  • Masks to be work at all times,
  • All surface are cleaned routinely after use.
We thank you for your understanding during this period; restrictions will be lifted when safe to do so. The pop up is appearing as below, where the entire page is white. We just need this to be in the previous pop up design which was a blue box with white writing, and the webpage still appeared behind. There is still access to the booking form, we need this changed so that clicking through to 'Book Now' does not take guests to this page: https://sargoodoncollaroy.com/book-now/. Heath has done this for us previously, I'm not sure what the process was but they were unable to access the jotform once on that page (temporarily). These are urgent action items for us so if this could please be amended as soon as possible, it would be greatly appreciated! Thanks very much, Brittany

Hi Britt,

Thanks for submitting your request. Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Here is the link: https://sargoodoncollaroy.com/

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

action.text: Joel Maligalig assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body: @joel done with https://sargoodoncollaroy.com/conditions-of-stay/, I put in in Draft in the meantime. I added a pop up however it seems to be not displaying as it should. Could you also please check and update it as per below?

Hi Heath one edit, to the copy:



Due to the recent outbreak of COVID-19 in SydneySargood on Collaroy is now closed due to the evolving situation with the COVID-19 pandemic.

Sargood on Collaroy continues to monitor developments, take precautionary measures and strictly follow the guidelines of relevant authorities including the NSW Ministry of Health with regard to COVID-19. The health and wellbeing of our guests and staff members is our top priority. This decision will be reassessed on the 9th of July 2021. For booking enquiries, please call reception on (02) 8597 0600.



Thank you!

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,


Hope you managed to have a nice weekend despite the lockdown ☹


Unfortunately, Sargood is closed once again. Could we please have some changes made on the website?


Can this page be hidden temporarily again: https://sargoodoncollaroy.com/conditions-of-stay/


Can this ribbon be hidden temporarily:


Please shut access to the booking form on the website. Instead, can the book now button direct to the reception telephone number? (02) 8597 0600.


Could we please have the pop up activated again with the following information:


Due to the recent outbreak of COVID-19 in Sydney, Sargood on Collaroy is now closed.

Sargood on Collaroy continues to monitor developments, take precautionary measures and strictly follow the guidelines of relevant authorities including the NSW Ministry of Health with regard to COVID-19. The health and wellbeing of our guests and staff members is our top priority. This decision will be reassessed on the 9th of July 2021. For booking enquiries, please call reception on (02) 8597 0600.

Club Sargood remains open for physiotherapy and exercise physiology services. Where possible we are offering telehealth.

Please do not visit our Club Sargood facility if:

  • You feel unwell in any way,
  • You have been to any of the locations or travelled on nominated public transport routes, during the time and date indicated, in the "Self-isolate and get tested immediately if you've been to these locations" or "Monitor for symptoms if you've been to these locations" or "Public transport routes" tables at NSW Government - Latest news and updates,
  • You have travelled internationally in the last 14 days,
  • You have visited any of the NSW hotspots as identified on the Australian Government website https://www.nsw.gov.au/covid-19/latest-news-and-updates,
  • You have travelled to any of the interstate locations identified as having restrictions on the NSW Government website https://www.nsw.gov.au/covid-19/what-you-can-and-cant-do-under-rules/border-restrictions.
  • You have been in contact with anyone with a confirmed or suspected case of COVID-19.

We have additional precautions in place to ensure the safety of our Club Sargood members including:

  • Pre-screening SMS messages will be sent to all clients 24 hours before arrival,
  • Clients must enter gym via Level 1 only. No access to Level 2,
  • Clients are only able to access site 5 minutes before their session time and must leave immediately afterwards,
  • Staggered start and finishing times to avoid client crossover,
  • Only 1 client permitted in the Club Sargood gym at any time,
  • NO visitors allowed onsite,
  • Clients may have support workers accompany them to site. Support workers must only remain in gym if required to assist client during session otherwise can wait offsite for client to finish session,
  • No independent use of gym - clients are only allowed onsite for a pre-booked therapy appointment,
  • COVID-19 screening and temperature checks will take place for all clients upon arrival,
  • Practice social distancing - stay 1.5 metres from others where ever possible,
  • Masks to be work at all times,
  • All surface are cleaned routinely after use.

We thank you for your understanding during this period; restrictions will be lifted when safe to do so.


Thanks team,

Britt
